abstract: Rep John Conyers urges House Judiciary Committee to hold hearings on antitrust and other issues in college sports.
snippet: Representative John Conyers of Michigan urged the panel to hold hearings on antitrust and other issues in college sports, including the recent series of conference realignments.
lead_paragraph: Representative John Conyers of Michigan urged the panel to hold hearings on antitrust and other issues in college sports, including the recent series of conference realignments.
